channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man injured in drive-by shooting in downtown St. Louis
Democrats want health care tax credits to end the shutdown. Why the GOP says not yet.
Katie Porter nearly storms out of CBS interview: ‘I don’t want all this on camera’
Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem appears to have forgotten video evidence showing how the incident with Sen. Alex Padilla actually went down.
Israel's Ben-Gvir prays at Al-Aqsa mosque compound, urges 'Gaza victory'
Defendant's DNA found on gas can in failed arson of news van in Utah, prosecutors say
item.description: Authorities say a man's DNA was found on a gasoline can that was placed under a news vehicle in a failed arson attempt in Salt Lake City

item.title: National Guard troops are outside Chicago and could be in Memphis soon in Trump's latest deployment
item.description: National Guard troops are positioned outside Chicago and they could soon be in Memphis as the Trump administration pushes ahead with an aggressive pol...

item.title: Man charged in 1973 killing of Conn. woman dies after found unresponsive in cell
item.description: George Legere, charged last month in a 1973 Connecticut cold case murder, has died

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Tuesday’s Mega Millions

item.title: Dogs kill 2-year-old boy at Georgia daycare center
item.description: A 2-year-old boy in south Georgia has died after being attacked by two Rottweilers at an unlicensed daycare
